title: AMC Shares Fall After CEO, CFO Sell Stock
sub_head: Sale generated $10.2 million for the movie-theater chain executives
body:
Shares in AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. fell more than 10% in trading on Friday after the chief executive officer and chief financial officer sold all or most of their currently vested interest in the company.
After the market closed on Thursday, Chairman and CEO Adam Aron and CFO Sean Goodman disclosed that they have sold 312,500 and 18,316 shares in the company, respectively, according to filings to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.
